review: I know that there are super secret hacks for the cognoscenti that allow one to transmute Pb to Au, but for the naive consumer buying the dang thing, there are precisely 3 things one can do:1) Enjoy a really magnificent slide show.2) Watch Netflix.3) Watch YouTubeWhen one can stream ANY content, from any IOS or Android device, then I say oh hell yes, till then... meh...Update as of 9 February, 2014:Well thanks to another user pointing me to:[...]I saw a list of supported apps. If you install any of theses apps, and connect to your Chromecast using the Chrome cast app first, then you can stream content. From a laptop running Chrome, you can send tabs using the Chromecast extension.I would like to add an additional star to my review and say I don't regret buying the thing, I think it's pretty dang cool, but still it would be friendly to include better documentation, and it would be helpful for the ancient likes of me if Google would update the IOS app to show all supported apps.Just saying
